trans-unit.source: Gets the state of a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> object.
The <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> enumeration is returned by the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRowState> 열거형에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Data.DataRow> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example first creates a new <xref:System.Data.DataTable> with one column, then creates a single <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서는 먼저 새 만듭니다 <xref:System.Data.DataTable> 하나의 열이 있는 단일 다음 만듭니다 <xref:System.Data.DataRow>합니다.

trans-unit.source: As the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> is created, added, modified, and deleted, its <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> is printed.
trans-unit.target: 로 <xref:System.Data.DataRow> 은 생성, 추가, 수정 및 삭제 하 고, 해당 <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> 인쇄 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The row has been added to a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection" />, and <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> has not been called.
The row was deleted using the <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.Delete" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.Delete" />의 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> 메서드를 사용하여 행을 삭제했습니다.

trans-unit.source: The row has been created but is not part of any <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRowCollection" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> is in this state immediately after it has been created and before it is added to a collection, or if it has been removed from a collection.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" />는 만들어진 직후 및 컬렉션에 추가되기 전 또는 컬렉션에서 제거된 경우 이 상태가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The row has been modified and <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> has not been called.
The row has not changed since <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" /> was last called.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges" />가 마지막으로 호출된 이후에 행이 변경되지 않았습니다.
